How to Run the Game
==================

1. Make sure you have Python installed on your computer
   - If you don't have Python, download and install it from: https://www.python.org/downloads/
   - During installation, make sure to check "Add Python to PATH"

2. Double-click the "Start Game.bat" file
   - This will open your web browser automatically
   - The game will start in your default web browser
   - If the browser doesn't open automatically, go to: http://localhost:8000

3. To close the game:
   - Close your browser tab
   - Close the black command window that opened

Enjoy playing!
